column1: With the national debt now topping $23 trillion the Congressional Budget Office should calculate not just the principal cost but the debt servicing costs too. We owe it to America’s taxpayers. https://t.co/WuXlJRHm2i
USMCA: Good for Idaho. Good for America. https://t.co/GgP0jNRLz4

Today on #NationalReligiousFreedomDay we recommit to protecting everyone’s right to freedom of belief and worship in the United States and around the world. Freedom of religion is at the core of our nation’s values. https://t.co/OvQQcSpNaN

Today I submitted a statement into the Congressional Record honoring Idaho's Robert Long on winning 1st place in the Mongol Derby. This is one of the toughest tests of skill & endurance for any horseman & I'm proud that an Idahoan represented the U.S. with such excellence.
The #USMCA is a win for Idaho’s small businesses and ag producers and I’m proud we were able to get this historic deal done. https://t.co/6a1TcKExah

It's good news for Idaho that included in phase one of the China trade deal is a provision facilitating the export of Idaho potatoes — an issue that went unresolved for 20 years until now. https://t.co/vsKdqvhS5W

In 2018 Idaho’s exports to Canada & Mexico totaled more than $1 billion.   #USMCA will provide #Idaho producers & innovators with: ✅ Open markets ✅ Free & fair trade ✅ Much needed certainty  Let’s get this done! #USMCAnow https://t.co/cKZrCIagSq
Thank you to Idaho's law enforcement professionals for keeping our communities safe! #NationalLawEnforcementAppreciationDay https://t.co/qRVAPXUSwE
At 8:45a MST/10:45a EST I'll be talking with @jimsciutto on @CNN about #Iran and the latest with #impeachment.
COMING UP: I'll be speaking with @BillHemmer and @SandraSmithFox on @FoxNews at 8:30a MST/10:30a EST about the latest with #Iran.  Hope you can tune in!

Congratulations to Jovita Carranza on being confirmed as the new @SBAgov Administrator! I’m confident she’ll do a great job advocating for American small businesses and strengthening the economic success we have achieved since 2016.
Happy New Year! https://t.co/ZgDWEcBuz7
To everyone celebrating today Vicki and I wish you a very Merry Christmas! https://t.co/JZ8VT4Wzwu

ICYMI: Last week my bill to update the Pittman-Robertson Fund became law. The legislation will ensure outdoorsmen & women can carry on treasured hunting traditions while conserving wildlife for future generations to enjoy. https://t.co/98WKjugfhx

Two years on from tax reform and we’ve seen 4.6 million new jobs a 50-year low unemployment rate and the longest economic expansion in U.S. history. Tax reform is working for Americans. https://t.co/KrxtMZBMS2

Pleased to see the @EPWGOP Committee advance a package with my bill to modernize the Pittman-Robertson Fund. This bipartisan bill will promote hunting traditions and ensure the continued successful funding of wildlife conservation.
The #FY20NDAA provides big victories for Idaho and our servicemen and women. I'm proud to support this important bipartisan legislation and send it to the President's desk. https://t.co/JRLGluq0x4
THIS JUST IN: Two-year authorization for the Secure Rural Schools program made it into Congress' end-of-year funding package. Click here to learn more: https://t.co/Dm0N4Girh0
Always Ready Always There. Happy 383rd Birthday to the @USNationalGuard! #Guard383 https://t.co/JMPUEjurtK
Another important step toward making @NuScale_Power's groundbreaking #SMR design a reality. Congratulations! https://t.co/gdprQmKhe9

#Idaho’s rural counties shouldn’t be subjected to the annual guessing game of whether they’ll be able to provide critical county services. Congress must support our rural communities and reauthorize #SRS and #PILT. https://t.co/dDC57psZw1
The #USMCA trade deal is a huge win for Idaho’s farmers ranchers and small businesses and I’m pleased this historic agreement will go to President Trump’s desk for his signature. #Idaho #USMCAnow
We Republicans are free traders. We know that free trade is the bedrock of a healthy economy and Canada and Mexico are the United States’ natural trading partners.

To celebrate Computer Science Education Week I joined the thousands of Idaho students participating in #HourofCode. Computer programming can change the world. I encourage you to participate in the movement by visiting https://t.co/ITGCELSFcC. #IdahoSTEMAC https://t.co/Zn9pynjHiW

Today I sent a letter with @SenAngusKing to @FERC about #Huawei. The dangers associated with using Huawei equipment on U.S. critical infrastructure cannot be overstated. I urge FERC to ensure our national grid is secure and free of outside interference. https://t.co/VfOPjxPqHc
This morning at 8:05am MST I'll be speaking live with Neal Larson on @kidnewsradio.  Tune in here: https://t.co/j03msRYGpo
Reducing burdensome red tape means unleashing greater economic opportunity for all Idahoans. Thanks to @GovernorLittle and the Idaho Legislature on this great work! https://t.co/1L3fy5QN1Y

I met with @TeamLucyMeyer an inspiring young advocate for people around the world who live with disabilities & who deserve the same opportunities as everyone else. Thanks to @UNICEF and @SpecialOlympics for their work with Lucy and many others on inclusivity around the world! https://t.co/RX70HXERID

The US set the standard for accessibility for disabled persons and we continue to fight for their inclusion. Today on #InternationalDisabilityDay we continue to respect the rights dignity and inclusion of persons with disabilities at home and around the world. #ThisAbility
Congratulations @INL! These awards are further evidence of the Lab's unparalleled leadership on nuclear energy cyber security and critical infrastructure protection. https://t.co/ND35sgqXBL
Today I joined @SteveDaines in cosponsoring the Small County #PILT Parity Act to ensure the federal government fulfills its obligation to all of Idaho’s counties.

I'm proud to recognize R & H Machine in Caldwell as the December Idaho Small Business of the Month! Owners & operators Kathy & Dave Organ have made R & H Machine an exemplary family owned business that provides farmers with the best deals on superior products. Congratulations!

The loss of life is always terrible and the news of the plane crash killing nine members of the Hansen family is absolutely devastating. Vicki and I offer our prayers to the Hansens and the entire Idaho Falls community in this difficult time. https://t.co/idCbRDGdoX

Funding effective & efficient global health programs is critical to ending the global #AIDS epidemic. On #WorldAIDSDay I encourage my Senate colleagues to pass my bipartisan resolution with @SenatorMenendez supporting @GlobalFund’s important work fighting AIDSTB and malaria.
Idaho’s small business owners are the heartbeat of our state’s thriving economy. This #SmallBusinessSaturday support your local entrepreneurs and #ThinkBigShopSmall. https://t.co/MGuOqOlMUx
Happy Thanksgiving! Vicki and I wish everyone a blessed Thanksgiving full of joy and gratitude. https://t.co/DF54hvcbrt

Congratulations @JayKIFI on 35 great years with @localnews8! Your decades of thoughtful reporting have made you a staple of the Idaho Falls community & you'll be greatly missed on the weeknight news. I wish you & your family the very best. Thank you for all you've done for Idaho!

I’m proud to honor Kellogg Lumber as the final Veteran-owned Idaho Small Business of the Month for November. Thank you to @USArmy veteran Steve Bristow for your service to our nation and congratulations to all the employees of Kellogg Lumber!
The federal government made a commitment to provide reliable support to our rural communities. We must reauthorize #PILT and #SRS. https://t.co/Yh9D9lIgGj

Congratulations to Leisureland RV in Boise on being named the Veteran-owned Idaho Small Business of the Day. Thank you to owner & operator @usairforce veteran John DeHoff for your service to our country!
I spoke with the @TODAYshow about the Trump administration's success with bringing Americans home. Idahoans can watch my conversation live at 7:40am Mountain Time. https://t.co/t98JXDXhAN

Today I'm recognizing Hammer Down River Excursions in White Bird as the #Veteran-owned Idaho Small Business of the Day! Congratulations to owner & operator @USArmy #veteran Homer Brown and all the employees at Hammer Down River Excursions. You make Idaho proud.
Any reauthorization of the Higher Education Act must strengthen workforce development efforts. Read my letter with @MikeCrapo to @GOPHELP here: https://t.co/8UyJQU8u8j

Nuclear energy must remain a central pillar of US energy policy. Thanks to @ANS_org for hosting today's discussion about the future of nuclear energy & honoring me w/ the President's Citation award. W/ innovation from @INL & industry leaders we will stay at the head of the pack. https://t.co/Nn8FrlHdX2

Today I'm honoring Critical Power Products and Services in Post Falls as the Veteran-owned Idaho Small Business of the Day. Thank you to Critical Power owner & operator Will Alt for your faithful service to our nation in the @USArmy. God bless you!

Thanks to Idaho Lt. Governor Janice McGeachin for coming by my office today. From one (former) lieutenant governor to another I can confirm she’s doing a great job serving Idaho! https://t.co/SW6lDM0f3Y

Had a great meeting today with Idahoan Dan McKnight from Bring Our Troops Home. I’m grateful for conversations like ours about the importance of ending forever wars safely & swiftly. I agree with him and support ending our engagements responsibly—we owe that to our veterans. https://t.co/ieYV83KT2C

Congratulations to A & J Auto Repair in Twin Falls on being named the Veteran-owned Idaho Small Business of the Day. Thank you to owner & operator @USMC #veteran Charles "Abe" Abrahamson for his service to our nation! You make our great state proud.

Happy #NationalApprenticeshipWeek! Apprenticeships are a valuable workforce development tool that provide students with hands-on instruction to help them excel in high-demand careers. Click here to learn more about #apprenticeship opportunities: https://t.co/AqzbaC0R9t

Congratulations to the @FarmBureau on 100 years! America's farmers and ranchers make us a better and more prosperous nation. Thank you for all that you do to keep our country healthy and strong. #AFBF100 https://t.co/X5rX1rOmKZ

I’m proud to recognize Mac’s Vacs of Lewiston as the veteran-owned #Idaho small business of the day! @macsvacuum is owned and operated by @usairforce #veteran Dennis Prine whose decades of steady leadership has made Mac’s Vacs a staple in the Lewiston community. Congratulations!

Happy Veterans Day to the men and women who have faithfully and courageously defended our nation. Yours is a debt that cannot be repaid. May God bless you and your families and thank you for your service.  #VeteransDay
My #1 priority is representing Idahoans in D.C. and this is a great example of how your input can make a difference.

Today I did just that during a lunch with @POTUS at the White House. That prompted a lengthy and productive discussion about how we can help the ag industry. The President is fully engaged on the issue and he is on our side.

Thank you again to the thousands of Idahoans who participated in my tele-town hall last night. During the call Tracy Walton from Emmett made a great point about the effects of trade on the agricultural industry. I promised I would carry his message to the President.

Today’s announcement from the Governor’s office has been many years in the making. Congratulations to @GovernorLittle @lawrencewasden @ENERGY and @INL on this historic agreement! https://t.co/vSqeYCu7Wg

I'm proud to honor Eagle Rock Gallery of Idaho Falls as the #Veteran-owned Idaho Small Business of the Day. Congratulations to @USArmy veterans Gary and Kathi Jensen on this achievement and thank you for your service to our country!

Tonight I held a tele-town hall to hear from Idahoans about the issues that are most important to them. We had a lot of great questions about #trade the #ColumbiaRiverTreaty #cybersecurity and more. Thank you to everyone who participated!

Congratulations to @popularpatch of Hayden on being named the #Veteran-owned Idaho Small Business of the Day. @USNavy vet Don McGrogan collected military patches during his service and upon reentering civilian life turned his hobby into a career. Thank you Don for your service!

Four of @INL's top researchers and scientists were named Women Worth Watching for 2019. Congratulations to Dr. Anne Gaffney Dr. Monica Regalbuto Dr. Erin Searcy and Virginia Wright on this great achievement. You make #Idaho proud!

This week is National #Veterans Small Business Week and today I'm honored to name @RhinoMetals of Caldwell as the Veteran-owned Idaho Small Business of the Day. Rhino Metals is owned and operated by @usairforce vet Don Suggs. Thank you Don for your service to our country!

Congratulations to @HansonGarageInc of Orofino on being named the Idaho #SmallBiz of the Month for October. You make our great state proud and I look forward to watching your continued growth and success.

I am particularly pleased to see the NATO resolution that I coauthored with a bipartisan group of colleagues advance to the Senate floor. As we will tomorrow mark the 70th anniversary of the alliance it is an excellent time to affirm our commitment to NATO and our allies.

The committee moved General John Abizaid & Ambassador Matthew Tueller one step closer to confirmation. We badly need their representation in Saudi Arabia & Iraq respectively and I am glad that we have moved them forward.

I am pleased that our committee was able to come together today and vote out a sizable number of @realDonaldTrump's nominees as well as 7 very important resolutions. We made great strides in staffing up the @StateDept. Full statement: https://t.co/yCSedrB9JZ

Looking back and remembering the accomplishments of NATO is important. NATO remains the preeminent political-military alliance in the world. Together we worked to defeat the Soviet Union and usher in decades of peace and prosperity for Europe.

Former Soviet-bloc countries clamored for NATO membership not only protection against Russia but for the economic strength that membership could foster. U.S. trade with our fellow NATO members remains key to our economy.

NATO has proven not only to be a military success but a political and economic one. For its members NATO’s security umbrella has provided the kind of stable environment necessary for economic growth and investment.
For 70 years "NATO has remained an important piece of the framework that supports our collective security." https://t.co/pv63R1sqnY

The socialist principles espoused in the #GreenNewDeal are absurd & unrealistic and would bankrupt the country. We all want to be good stewards for our natural resources & environment but this proposal was not serious practically doable nor would it achieve that goal.

Finally Special Counsel Robert Mueller deserves recognition for conducting a straightforward investigation into Russia’s attempted interference in our elections despite the magnifying glass he worked under over the past two years.

All of this has been a deliberate distraction & the charade has gone on long enough. It’s time for our nation to come together & move forward as one. With the conclusion of this investigation I hope the Democrats will join us in doing so.

Over the past two years Democrats and many in the national media have made horrible claims against @realDonaldTrump have questioned his loyalty to our country & have consistently assured the American people of his guilt. They were wrong.

For me there was no news in Mueller’s report. We have reviewed thousands of documents including dozens of witness statements throughout the intel committee’s investigation & I reached the same conclusion as Mueller: @realDonaldTrump did not collude with the Russians.
